review: Any app involving playing music using this device simply does not work.Spotify app? The music stops randomly after a few songs.Pandora? Hops, skips, and jumps.Airplay? See the Spotify.Amazon Music? No thanks.If you have a "Smart" TV aka a television that has apps then you certainly do not need this dongle. It is cheap for a reason. I am utterly perplexed as to why anyone would ever claim that this device offers any value to your home entertainment system. It's neither here nor there - period.
author: Buddy Howl

review: - high build quality, includes all needed accessories- very stable WIFI, compared to Chinese Android sticks- 1080p picture quality is very good- bluetooth remote works well, no line of sight needed- much more functional than a Chromecast, since it can run without being initiated by another device, also allows you to install many Android apps and like the Chromecast fling content from tablets/phones- Ability to sideload apps without much effort is great- recommend getting these for each of your TVs
